name: Kristopher Spencer
coverLetter: 2 years experience as a foreman for a multi-million dollar, commercial 13 Acre outdoor Medical Cannabis Farm in Humboldt County, all of which is organically dry-farmer. Averaging 4,000 lbs the first year and 13,000 lbs. the second. have experience from germinating seeds to sexing, transplanting, breeding, organic pest prevention, pruning, inventory, harvesting, curing and bucking. I am looking for a lead grower position ultimately, however am open to other opportunities.. I have my own home/transportation so Iâ€™d prefer to live off-site but am also open to it with the right opportunity.
